mapper.select: SELECT ord_no orderNumber, oid id, order_subject_type orderSubjectType FROM ord_base_info

/*SELECT ord_no orderNumber, oid id FROM ord_base_info WHERE delivery_type = 'HOUSE_DELIVERY'*/ SELECT t.ord_no orderNumber, t.oid id FROM td_own_money_record_copy o INNER JOIN ( SELECT o.ord_no, o.oid FROM ord_base_info o LEFT JOIN ord_arrears_audit a ON a.ord_no = o.ord_no WHERE o.delivery_type = 'HOUSE_DELIVERY' AND a.id IS NULL ) t ON t.ord_no = o.order_number WHERE 1 = 1 AND (owned != 0 OR payed != 0) GROUP BY order_number
SELECT owned, payed, money, pos, create_time, ispassed, is_payed FROM td_own_money_record_copy WHERE order_number = #{orderNumber} GROUP BY order_number

SELECT real_user_real_name, real_user_username, seller_real_name, seller_username, IFNULL(shipping_address, '') shipping_address, order_number FROM td_order_copy WHERE main_order_number = #{orderNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_arrears_audit (user_id, customer_name, customer_phone, seller_name, seller_phone, ord_no, agency_money, order_money, real_money, cash_money, pos_money, alipay_money, wechat_money, payment_method, distribution_address, distribution_time, remarks, status, create_time, seller_id, picture, whether_repayments, repayment_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{customerName}, #{customerPhone}, #{sellerName}, #{sellerphone}, #{orderNumber}, #{agencyMoney}, #{orderMoney}, #{realMoney}, #{cashMoney}, #{posMoney}, #{alipayMoney}, #{wechatMoney}, #{paymentMethod}, #{distributionAddress}, #{distributionTime}, #{remarks}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{sellerId}, #{picture}, #{whetherRepayments}, #{repaymentTime})
mapper.select: SELECT emp_id FROM emp_employee WHERE mobile = #{phone} GROUP BY mobile
SELECT * FROM td_order_data_copy WHERE main_order_number = #{orderNumber} GROUP BY main_order_number
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT id FROM ord_arrears_audit WHERE ord_no = #{orderNumber})
SELECT driver FROM td_delivery_info_copy WHERE order_number = #{orderNumber} GROUP BY order_number
SELECT emp_id FROM emp_employee WHERE delivery_clerk_no = #{clerkNo} GROUP BY emp_id

SELECT DISTINCT obi.oid, tdc.main_order_number, tdc.deliver_type_title, tdc.diy_site_code, tdc.diy_site_name, ss.detailed_address, tdc.delivery_date, tdi.driver, ee.emp_id, ee.NAME, ee.mobile, tdi.wh_no, tdc.shipping_name, tdc.shipping_phone, tdc.shipping_address, tdc.city, tdc.disctrict, tdc.subdistrict, tdc.detail_address FROM td_order_copy tdc LEFT JOIN td_delivery_info_copy tdi ON tdi.order_number = tdc.main_order_number LEFT JOIN ord_base_info obi ON obi.ord_no = tdc.main_order_number LEFT JOIN st_store ss ON ss.store_code = tdc.diy_site_code LEFT JOIN emp_employee ee ON ee.delivery_clerk_no = tdi.driver WHERE tdc.order_time > '2017-10-01 00:00:00' AND tdc.main_order_number = #{orderNumber} ORDER BY tdi.begin_dt DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cp_cash_coupon (create_time, `condition`, denomination, effective_start_time, effective_end_time, description, initial_quantity, remaining_quantity, title, city_id, city_name, `type`, is_specified_store, sort_id, `status`) VALUES (#{createTime}, #{condition}, #{denomination}, #{effectiveStartTime}, #{effectiveEndTime}, #{description}, #{initialQuantity}, #{remainingQuantity}, #{title} , #{cityId}, #{cityName}, #{type}, #{isSpecifiedStore}, #{sortId}, #{status})

INSERT INTO cus_customer_cash_coupon (cus_id, ccid, qty, get_time, is_used, use_time, use_ord_no, down_time, status, `condition`, denomination, effective_start_time, effective_end_time, descripttion, title, city_id, city_name, `type`, is_specified_store, last_update_time) VALUES (#{cusId}, #{ccid}, #{qty}, #{getTime}, #{isUsed}, #{useTime}, #{useOrderNumber}, #{downTime}, #{status}, #{condition}, #{denomination}, #{effectiveStartTime}, #{effectiveEndTime}, #{description}, #{title}, #{cityId}, #{cityName}, #{type}, #{isSpecifiedStore}, #{lastUpdateTime})
INSERT INTO cp_cash_coupon_company (ccid, company_id, company_name, company_flag) VALUES (#{ccid}, #{companyId}, #{companyName}, #{companyFlag})

INSERT INTO ord_coupon_info (oid, ord_no, coupon_type, coupon_id, purchase_price, cost_price, get_type, sku) VALUES (#{oid}, #{orderNumber}, #{couponType}, #{couponId}, #{purchasePrice}, #{costPrice}, #{getType}, #{sku});
mapper.select: SELECT credit, pay_time, wallet_money, alipay_money, pay_time, is_seller_order FROM td_order_copy WHERE main_order_number = #{orderNumber}
SELECT driver, task_no, wh_no FROM td_delivery_info_copy WHERE begin_dt > '2017-10-01 00:00:00' AND order_number = #{orderNo}
SELECT id, diy_site_code, main_order_number, pay_time, status_id FROM td_order_copy WHERE main_order_number = #{orderNo}
SELECT sku, jx_dif, quantity, dif_total FROM td_order_goods_copy WHERE td_order_id = #{id}
SELECT c.main_order_number FROM td_order_copy c LEFT JOIN ord_base_info b ON c.main_order_number = b.ord_no WHERE b.ord_no IS NULL GROUP BY c.main_order_number;

SELECT main_order_number, order_time, pay_time, status_id, deliver_type_title, is_seller_order, user_id, username, seller_id, diy_site_code, seller_real_name, seller_username, real_user_real_name, real_user_username, remark, city, paper_sales_number, sum(total_goods_price) total_goods_price FROM td_order_copy WHERE main_order_number = #{mainOrderNumber} GROUP BY main_order_number
SELECT e.emp_id, e.`name`, e.mobile FROM fit_employee_copy c INNER JOIN emp_employee e ON c.mobile = e.mobile WHERE c.id = #{userId}
SELECT e.emp_id, e.`name`, e.mobile FROM td_user_copy c INNER JOIN emp_employee e ON c.username = e.mobile WHERE c.id = #{sellerId}
SELECT e.cus_id, e.`name`, e.mobile, e.customer_type FROM td_user_copy c INNER JOIN cus_customer e ON c.username = e.mobile WHERE c.id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_logistics_info (oid, ord_no, delivery_type, booking_store_code, booking_store_name, booking_store_address, delivery_time, delivery_clerk_no, delivery_clerk_id, delivery_clerk_name, delivery_clerk_phone, warehouse, is_owner_receiving, receiver, receiver_phone, shipping_address, residence_name, delivery_province, delivery_city, delivery_county, delivery_street, detailed_address) VALUES (#{oid}, #{ordNo}, #{deliveryType}, #{bookingStoreCode}, #{bookingStoreName}, #{bookingStoreAddress}, #{deliveryTime}, #{deliveryClerkNo}, #{deliveryClerkId}, #{deliveryClerkName}, #{deliveryClerkPhone}, #{warehouse}, #{isOwnerReceiving}, #{receiver}, #{receiverPhone}, #{shippingAddress}, #{residenceName}, #{deliveryProvince}, #{deliveryCity}, #{deliveryCounty}, #{deliveryStreet}, #{detailedAddress})
mapper.select: SELECT main_order_number orderNumber, id id FROM td_order_copy
SELECT id, order_number, jx_total_price FROM td_order_copy WHERE main_order_number = #{orderNumber}
SELECT gid FROM gds_goods WHERE sku = #{sku} GROUP BY sku
SELECT id, coupon_order_number, IFNULL(buy_price, 0) buy_price, is_buy FROM td_coupon WHERE sku = #{sku} AND order_number = #{orderNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cus_customer_product_coupon (cus_id, seller_id, store_id, gid, quantity, get_type, get_time, get_ord_no, buy_price, effective_start_time, effective_end_time, is_used, use_time, use_ord_no, goods_line_id, disable_time, status, last_update_time) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{sellerId}, #{storeId}, #{goodsId}, #{quantity}, #{getType}, #{getTime}, #{getOrderNumber}, #{buyPrice}, #{effectiveStartTime}, #{effectiveEndTime}, #{isUsed}, #{useTime}, #{useOrderNumber}, #{goodsLineId}, #{disableTime}, #{status}, #{lastUpdateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT id FROM ord_billing_details WHERE ord_no = #{orderNumber})
SELECT id, purchase_price FROM ord_coupon_info WHERE ord_no = #{orderNumber} AND coupon_type = #{type}
SELECT main_order_number, operation_type FROM td_order_delivery_time_seq_detail_copy WHERE main_order_number = #{mainOrderNumber} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT cus_id, name, mobile, customer_type FROM cus_customer WHERE mobile = #{realUserUsername}

SELECT c.main_order_number, c.order_time, c.pay_time, c.status_id, c.deliver_type_title, c.is_seller_order, c.user_id, c.username, c.seller_id, c.diy_site_code, c.seller_real_name, c.seller_username, c.real_user_real_name, c.real_user_username, c.remark, c.city, c.paper_sales_number, sum(c.total_goods_price) total_goods_price, c.real_user_id FROM td_order_copy c LEFT JOIN ord_base_info b ON c.main_order_number = b.ord_no WHERE b.ord_no IS NULL GROUP BY c.main_order_number;

SELECT c.main_order_number, c.order_time, c.pay_time, c.status_id, c.deliver_type_title, c.is_seller_order, c.user_id, c.username, c.seller_id, c.diy_site_code, c.seller_real_name, c.seller_username, c.real_user_real_name, c.real_user_username, c.remark, c.city, c.paper_sales_number, sum(c.total_goods_price) total_goods_price, c.real_user_id FROM td_order_copy c LEFT JOIN ord_base_info b ON c.main_order_number = b.ord_no WHERE b.ord_no IS NULL and c.main_order_number = #{orderNo} GROUP BY c.main_order_number;

SELECT c.id, c.cancel_time, c.check_time, c.diy_site_address, c.diy_site_id, c.diy_site_tel, c.diy_site_title, c.manager_remark_info, c.order_number, c.order_time, c.pay_type_id, c.pay_type_title, c.remark_info, c.return_number, c.return_time, c.status_id, c.username, c.deliver_type_title, c.turn_price, c.turn_type, c.driver, c.seller_real_name, c.shopping_address, c.diy_code, c.status_name, c.turn_type_name, c.return_detail, c.is_coupon, c.cancel_return_time, c.seller_username, c.jx_return, c.credit, c.promotion_money_payed, c.alipay_money, c.wallet_money FROM td_return_note_copy c LEFT JOIN ord_return_base_info b ON c.return_number = b.return_no WHERE b.return_no IS NULL GROUP BY c.return_number;
SELECT owned, payed, money, pos, create_time, ispassed, is_payed, serial_number FROM td_own_money_record_copy WHERE order_number = #{orderNumber} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ord_billing_details (create_time, oid, ord_no, total_goods_price, member_discount, promotion_discount, freight, upstairs_fee, lebi_quantity, lebi_cash_discount, cash_coupon_discount, product_coupon_discount, cus_pre_deposit, online_pay_type, online_pay_amount, st_pre_deposit, emp_credit_money, st_credit_money, st_subvention, order_amount_subtotal, amount_payable, collection_amount, arrearage, is_owner_receiving, online_pay_time, pay_up_time, is_pay_up, store_cash, store_other_money, store_pos_money, store_pos_number) VALUES (#{createTime}, #{oid}, #{orderNumber}, #{totalGoodsPrice}, #{memberDiscount}, #{promotionDiscount}, #{freight}, #{upstairsFee}, #{lebiQuantity}, #{lebiCashDiscount}, #{cashCouponDiscount}, #{productCouponDiscount}, #{cusPreDeposit}, #{onlinePayType}, #{onlinePayAmount}, #{stPreDeposit}, #{empCreditMoney}, #{storeCreditMoney}, #{storeSubvention}, #{orderAmountSubtotal}, #{amountPayable}, #{collectionAmount}, #{arrearage}, #{isOwnerReceiving}, #{onlinePayTime}, #{payUpTime}, #{isPayUp}, #{storeCash}, #{storeOtherMoney}, #{storePosMoney}, #{storePosNumber} )

INSERT INTO data_transfer_error_log(order_number, error_msg, create_time) VALUES
(#{error.orderNumber},#{error.errorMsg},#{error.createTime})
INSERT INTO data_transfer_error_log (order_number, error_msg, create_time) VALUES (#{orderNumber}, #{errorMsg}, #{createTime})
mapper.select: SELECT gid, sku, sku_name, goods_detail, type_name, brand_name, category_name FROM gds_goods_copy
SELECT * FROM gds_goods_type_copy
SELECT * FROM gds_goods_brand_copy
SELECT * FROM gds_goods_category_copy
SELECT s.*, c.city_id, c.name FROM st_store s LEFT JOIN city c ON s.city_id = c.city_id WHERE store_type = 'ZY' OR store_type = 'FXCK'
mapper.update:
UPDATE gds_goods_copy
goods_detail=#{goodsDetial},
cid=#{cid},
brd_id=#{brdId},
gtid=#{gtid},
WHERE sku=#{sku}
mapper.insert: INSERT st_inventory (create_time, last_update_time, city_id, city_code, city_name, store_id, store_code, store_name, gid, sku, sku_name, available_ity, real_ity) VALUES (#{createTime}, #{lastUpdateTime}, #{cityId}, #{cityCode}, #{cityName}, #{storeId}, #{storeCode}, #{storeName}, #{gid}, #{sku}, #{skuName}, #{availableIty}, #{realIty})
mapper.select: SELECT * from transfer_cus_template where status = false;
SELECT * from transfer_cus_pre_deposit_template where status = false;
SELECT *from transfer_cus_product_template where status = false;
mapper.update:
update transfer_cus_template
store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
cus_code = #{cusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cus_name = #{cusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cus_type = #{cusType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
cus_mobile = #{cusMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_code = #{empCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update transfer_cus_pre_deposit_template
cus_name = #{cusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cus_code = #{cusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cus_pre_depost = #{cusPreDepost,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update transfer_cus_product_template
cus_code = #{cusCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cus_name = #{cusName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_code = #{empCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_name = #{empName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
store_code = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sku = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_gift = #{isGift,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buy_time = #{buyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
buy_price = #{buyPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
